We need to produce JSON with summary, business_intent, keywords list. Based on class ObservabilityClient, methods are helpers for creating feedback, traces, dashboard, deleting spans, getting feedback, etc. So class is client for observability service, managing traces, feedback, dashboards. Provide summary: client interface to interact with observability backend, enabling creation, retrieval, update, deletion of trace data and feedback, and accessing dashboards. Business intent: facilitate monitoring and debugging of AI/ML applications by handling observability artifacts. Keywords: observability, traces, feedback, dashboard, client, API, monitoring, debugging, span, trace management, CRUD.

Make sure not to list method names verbatim. Avoid verbatim method names; we can refer to actions like creating feedback, retrieving traces, updating feedback, deleting spans, accessing dashboards. Provide JSON.

assistantfinal{
  "summary": "Provides a high‑level client for interacting with an observability service, allowing callers to record and manage trace data, feedback entries, and dashboard views, as well as retrieve and modify existing observability artifacts.",
  "business_intent": "Enable developers to instrument, monitor, and debug their applications by programmatically handling observability resources such as traces, spans, and user feedback, thereby improving system transparency and issue resolution.",
  "keywords": [
    "observability",
    "trace management",
    "feedback handling",
    "dashboard access",
    "API client",
    "monitoring",
    "debugging",
    "span deletion",
    "CRUD operations",
    "system instrumentation"
  ]
}
